title: How to make a correction in a registered sale deed - Quora
tags: Family Law, Property Law, Rent Control Law and Civil Litigation

response.answer_text: Greetings Friend It's like Registration process, you can make it through the same Persons who executed by submitting the Rectification deed along with the original deed to be corrected, Nothing to Worry, not expensive. Approach the document writer of the same Registration office,you can complete the issue on the same day, if you can reach there before opening of the office. Hope this would be helpful to plan for Rectification deed Registration All the Very Best ❤️ Please Up Vote if you Find Value
